website.static:
QuickFIX 1.13.2

QuickFIX Log Viewer 1.1.1

QuickFIX is a full-featured open source FIX engine, currently compatible with the FIX 4.0-5.0 spec. API's are available for C++, .NET, Python and Ruby.

QuickFIX/J is available for Java.
QuickFIX/N is available for .NET.

page.title: About
page.section: QuickFIX is a full-featured open source FIX engine, currently compatible with the FIX 4.0-5.0 spec. API's are available for C++, .NET, Python and Ruby. QuickFIX/J is available for Java. QuickFIX/N is available for .NET.

The Financial Information eXchange (FIX) Protocol is a "language" which defines specific kinds of electronic messages for communicating securities transactions between two parties. FIX defines only the format of the messages and the session-level interaction between two applications. More information on FIX can be found at the FIX protocol web site.

Documentation
Get started with our online documentation.
Mailing Lists
You can receive emails as they come, in daily batches, or browse the archives.
Forums
Interactive discussions with users and developers.
Bug Tracker
Here you can report defects and monitor their progress.
Support Contracts
Find out about our international support and consulting packages.

Need more information? Email us at ask@quickfixengine.org.

-->

Here is a list of free third party tools that can be used in conjunction with QuickFIX. These utilities are in no way affiliated with QuickFIX and are supported by their respective companies or organizations.

Product Company Description
ValidFIX ValidFIX Ltd FIX message analyzer that works through your browser. No installation, just go to this site and start decoding your messages.
QuickFAST QuickFAST An implementation of the FAST protocol. Generally used for market data. QuickFAST is not affiliated with QuickFIX
Ethereal Ethereal A very powerful and full featured network protocol analyzer which support hundred of protocols, including FIX. Use this to sniff out all FIX traffic regardless of what FIX engine it originates from.
Wireshark Wireshark Fork of Ethereal by the core development team.
FIX Data Dictionary transacttools Similar to FIXionary, but lighter weight. Only available online
FIXopaedia b2bits Another lightweght online FIX reference
Stunnel Stunnel.org Allows you to encrypt arbitrary TCP connections inside SSL. Use this to encrypt your FIX sessions without need to modify you're application code.

page.title: Documentation
page.section:
Online documentation for QuickFIX.
Online documentation for QuickFIX/J.
Online documentation for QuickFIX Log Viewer [PDF].
Complete instructions are available for installing QuickFIX and running the acceptance tests.
For help with the FIX protocol itself, check out the FIX Protocol Homepage. Of particular interest are the specification documents and the discussion forums

page.title: XML
page.section:
We created a parser to go through the FIX specs and generated well formed XML versions. We use this XML version to generate most of the code for our FIX engine. Seeing as though it is so useful for us, we figured other people might be interested too.

This is a machine readable version of the FIX specification. If you have been looking for such a thing, this is it! 

FIX  4.0 xml | html
FIX  4.1 xml | html
FIX  4.2 xml | html
FIX  4.3 xml | html
FIX  4.4 xml | html
FIX  5.0 xml | html
FIXT 1.1 xml | html

The XML documents were then reformatted into small browsable HTML files using this xsl stylesheet

page.title: Developers
page.section: Report and follow-up on bug reports here.

page.title: Services
page.section:
The following companies provide various QuickFIX consulting and support services:

  • Connamara Systems
    •       Software Development, Production Support Contracts for North America
  • Macdonald Associates Ltd.
    •       Software Development, Training Classes, Production Support Contracts for Europe
  • Object Computing, Inc.
    •       Software Development, Training Classes, Support Contracts
  • SmartQuant
    •       Quantitative Trading Integrated With QuickFIX

    If you are interested in learning about QuickFIX, FIX, and trading related services, just email us at ask@quickfixengine.org. Please leave your contact information such as email or a telephone number where you can be reached.

With offices in Chicago and New Delhi, Connamara Systems, LLC provides FIX consulting, QuickFIX support and custom trading systems development service to the equities and derivatives trading industries. Connamara was an initial collaborator in the creation of QuickFIX and continues to contribute to the enhancements and maintenance of the engine. More information can be found at www.connamara.com

Macdonald Associates Ltd., founded in 1983, has a pan-European presence covering the UK, Switzerland and Germany. The company has a range of trading products in the equity and fixed income markets and also offers training and consulting to financial institutions. Macdonald has been active in the QuickFIX community and uses QuickFIX within their own product line. For more details, see www.macd.com or email george.macdonald@macd.com

Object Computing Inc. (OCI) is a privately held software engineering company. OCI was founded in 1993 with a commitment to object oriented technology. Today OCI provides software systems consulting, product development, and educational services to progressive corporations across the United States in the Aerospace, Finance, Healthcare and Telecommunication market segments. OCI was one of the pioneers of open source middleware and has an extensive C++ and Java CORBA, open source client base. The St. Louis based OCI Education Center has one of the most extensive object technology and Java training curricula in the Mid West. OCI has a significant presence in Phoenix as well as St. Louis, where its corporate headquarters are located. OCI is a Sun Authorized Java Center and member of the OMG. For more information see www.ociweb.com

QuantStudio is an advanced financial framework that enables users to develop, test & implement their own quantitative trading strategies & applications over multiple asset classes. Their mission is to deliver a framework offering a complete set of features and tools for financial data analysis and trading. Find out more about QuantStudio at www.smartquant.com.
